segments.text: I see the boy standing on that wobbly stool, and I’m just waiting for him to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so focused on getting a cookie that she doesn’t even see how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman drying dishes, completely unaware of the chaos behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and it’s spreading all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to hurt himself, and no one is even paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so innocent, just waiting for her cookie, not realizing the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice what’s happening before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a mess, and it’s making me so frustrated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm everything looks outside while the kitchen is in chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just getting worse, and the woman doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR
